inclusion.criterion: HIV coinfection during IFN-based or IFN-free antiviral therapy for HCV infection
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Achieving SVR, defined as undetectable serum HCV RNA at week 12 off-therapy
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Poor access to sites for venipuncture
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has chronic HCV infection and is on combination therapy with IFN and RBV, but also has direct antiviral drugs added. He has a history of inguinal hernia surgery.
